20110107000804.000|20110107000806.000|CC1|VOMITING OUT HERE ON THE

20110107000826.000|20110107000828.000|CC1|THE AIR SO WE HAD TO            
20110107000828.000|20110107000829.000|CC1|EVACUATE THE BUILDING.
